segments.advisor_message: So, can you confirm your full name for me? Just so I have it right.
segments.client_message: Sure, it’s uh, Emily, Emily Johnson. Just Emily, I don’t really use a middle name or anything.

segments.advisor_message: Okay, great, Emily. And when's your birthday, if you don’t mind sharing that?
segments.client_message: I was born on January 15, 1990, so yeah, that's my birthday.
